name: MidNight (itch) (AnimatorGuy)
description:
MidNight is a Horror Sit & Survive styled game made on Unity 5.

You found yourself inside a left to rot and decay Science test building.

E.E.T.H was closed due rumors of testing their experiments in humans.You are there,to find if these rumors were true.

You don't have nothing but a flashlight and a camera to defend yourself,what could happen?

PC Requirements
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, Vista, 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 2.5GB of ram
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

EDIT:The current build is a early build,it has no enemys yet.
